root.name: Jupiter Lander
root.description: OverviewIn this game the player controls a space ship. The goal of the game is to land on the indicated landing strips. The player has a limited amount of fuel so the thrusters should be used wisely. The ship can refuel on platforms indicated as fueling stations. To conserve fuel it is best to let gravity take its course and then to thrust upwards before landing to prevent the ship from crashing due to impact.
